text:
To make new releases less disruptive features going away or APIs being changed in backwards incompatible ways should have deprecation warnings added first. When these deprecation warnings have lived live in a release for X amount of time then the breaking change can be applied.

Should update the release process with these details.
title: Features and API changes should be deprecated before being removed

text: It may also be worth bumping up to 1.x.x and using semantic versioning to indicate when breaking changes have been made.
